0042502C  AF 10 40 00 9B 10 40 00  ..@...@.
00425034  00 00 00 00 46 10 40 00  ....F.@.
0042503C  28 10 40 00 00 00 00 00  (.@.....
00425044  32 10 40 00 05 10 40 00  2.@...@.
0042504C  55 10 40 00 7D 10 40 00  U.@.}.@.
00425054  00 00 00 00 FC FF FF FF  ........
0042505C  14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  ........
00425064  FC FF FF FF 20 00 00 00  .... ...   20 00 00 00这是其成员空间相对偏移地址

00425074  69 10 40 00 00 00 00 00  i.@.....

00425084  7E 43 46 75 72 6E 69 74  ~CFurnit
0042508C  75 72 65 28 29 0A 00 00  ure()...
